LocaleResource.Name: ML.About.Intro1
LocaleResource.Value: For over six decades, MEDlight GmbH has been a leading medical device manufacturer in Germany, thanks to our continuous advancements of modern technologies. Over the years, we've established ourselves as a leading specialist.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.About.Intro2
LocaleResource.Value: Our commitment to innovation, exceptional German craftsmanship, and patient-centered solutions are the pillars upon which MEDlight stands. With over 60 international partners around the world, MEDlight’s products are used worldwide in clinics and medical practices.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.About.Sub1
LocaleResource.Value: In 1957, Gerhard Saalmann laid the foundation for the company that has always played a leading role in modern phototherapy.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.About.Timeline2
LocaleResource.Value: Specially designed selective UV-range for the treatment of Psoriasis

LocaleResource.Name: ML.About.Timeline3
LocaleResource.Value: Introduction of the first therapy device for the treatment of Neurodermatitis

LocaleResource.Name: ML.About.Timeline4
LocaleResource.Value: Innovation of the UV-Cabin for supporting vitamin D3 synthesis and treating Osteoporosis

LocaleResource.Name: ML.About.Timeline5
LocaleResource.Value: Development of the first photodynamic therapy device for skin cancer treatment

LocaleResource.Name: ML.About.Timeline6
LocaleResource.Value: Saalmann GmbH is rebranded as MEDlight GmbH

LocaleResource.Name: ML.About.Timeline7
LocaleResource.Value: Launch of the Red Beam pro-PDT-System utilizing the latest LED technology

LocaleResource.Name: ML.About.Timeline8
LocaleResource.Value: Introduction of the TREVIOLUX 3-in-1 PDT device.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Callus.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Do you have questions? Our MEDlight specialists are here to help, and it's absolutely free. Start the conversation today.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Callus.Page.Details.Title
LocaleResource.Value: Don't hesitate to contact us and we will get back to you as soon as we can.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Certified.Description1
LocaleResource.Value: MEDLight GmbH is a renowned medical device manufacturer from Germany with a history spanning over six decades in the development and production of UV phototherapy and photodynamic therapy devices.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Certified.Description2
LocaleResource.Value: Our business operations are characterized by a deep commitment to quality and responsibility. We undergo continuous certifications and maintain a professional quality management system that adheres to the highest European and German standards.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Certified.Image1
ML.Certified.Image2
ML.Config.GetDetails.List
LocaleResource.Value: Cost estimateDelivery datesInstallation planRecycle your old devices

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Config.NeedAssistance.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Request a quote and we will get into contact and help you make the best decision.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Config.RequestQuote
LocaleResource.Value: You can send us your configuration to get a free quote below.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Config.Services.Description1
LocaleResource.Value: Optimize your product package with MEDlight Service+. Benefit from an automatic warranty extension plan, coupled with access to top-tier technical support from the people with unmatched familiarity with your devices.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Config.Services.Description2
LocaleResource.Value: Are you interested in enrolling in MEDlight Academy? Empower your staff through precisely tailored training courses, curated by MEDlight to maximize the potential of your devices.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Config.Services.Description3
LocaleResource.Value: Tailor your product for global markets: customized language options, regulatory compliance, and power supply adaptation to meet diverse country requirements.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Config.Services.Intro
LocaleResource.Value: Would you like to add additional services?

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Config.Skindex.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Unlock the full potential of the N-LINE PRO paired with our SKINDEX software. Create patient records, streamline treatment planning, and operate the cabin with unparalleled ease. This all-in-one comprehensive workflow revolutionizes the way you manage your phototherapy treatments empowering you to focus on what matters most - your patients.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Config.Skindex.Intro
LocaleResource.Value: Would you like to use our treatment management software?

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Config.Skindex.Intro.Description
LocaleResource.Value: SKINdex is MEDlights propriety treatment management software. Combine data collection, therapy planning, and cabin operation into a single system. (Requires N-LINE PRO)

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Config.Spectrum.Description
LocaleResource.Value: UV phototherapy, also known as light therapy, is a common form of treatment that uses, ultraviolet light on exposed skin to treat several types of skin conditions. The choice of spectrum and treatment parameters are based on individual needs and considerations.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Config.Spectrum.Healthwarning
LocaleResource.Value: Please note that the information provided on this website is not medical advice. For treatment recommendations and personalized care, always consult qualified healthcare professionals.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Config.Spectrum.Mixed.Info.Title
LocaleResource.Value: For maximum flexibility you can install a lamp combination and always select the best treatment for each patient.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Config.Spectrum.UVA-1.Info.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Psoriasis, Parapsoriasis, Vitiligo, Atopic Dermatitis, Mycosis fungoides

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Config.Spectrum.UVA-PUVA.Info.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Psoriasis, Parapsoriasis, Vitiligo, Atopic Dermatitis, Mycosis fungoides

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Config.Spectrum.UVA-PUVA.Info.Title
LocaleResource.Value: UVA (including PUVA) is often considered for:

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Config.Spectrum.UVA.Info.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Psoriasis, Parapsoriasis, Vitiligo, Atopic Dermatitis, Mycosis fungoides, other skin diseases

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Config.Spectrum.UVA.Info.Title
LocaleResource.Value: UVB Broadband is often considered for:

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Config.Spectrum.UVB-311nm.Info.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Psoriasis, Parapsoriasis, Vitiligo, Atopic Dermatitis, Mycosis fungoides, other skin diseases

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Config.Spectrum.UVB-311nm.Info.Title
LocaleResource.Value: UVB Narrowband is often considered for:

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Config.Spectrum.UVB311.Info.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Psoriasis, Parapsoriasis, Vitiligo, Atopic Dermatitis, Mycosis fungoides, other skin diseases

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Config.Spectrum.UVB311.Info.Title
LocaleResource.Value: UVB Narrowband is often considered for:

LocaleResource.Name: ML.ContactUs.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Get a non-binding quote and tell us a bit about yourself so we can begin setting up an order. A MEDlight representative will contact you shortly to take the next steps.

LocaleResource.Value: The N-LINE T is designed to meet your specific requirements.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Footer.Sub
LocaleResource.Value: Stay informed with the latest updates and information from MEDlight. Receive news about events, products, collaborations with business partners, and more from the world of MEDlight. To get in touch with us, please provide your contact details, and we'll be in touch with you.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Guidance.BusinessSub
LocaleResource.Value: If you represent a business or organization, we are dedicated to meeting the needs of clients worldwide. Please schedule an appointment to explore the diverse options available for your enterprise.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Guidance.Sub1
LocaleResource.Value: Our team of experts is here to assist you in selecting the ideal solution to meet your specific requirements. We understand that each healthcare setting is unique, and we'll help you make the best choice.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Guidance.Sub3
LocaleResource.Value: Our commitment to you doesn't end with the delivery. We provide continuous training, support and service to ensure that your experience with our devices remains exceptional throughout their usage.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Guidance.Title
LocaleResource.Value: We provide guidance every step of the way.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Index-Carousel.Slide1.Image

ML.Index.Additionals
ML.Index.Additionals.Sub
LocaleResource.Value: In the development of our medical devices, we pay meticulous attention to every detail. Our commitment to innovation is propelling us forward on our path towards a more intelligent and sustainable future in healthcare. This same commitment is also reflected in our 'Additionals,' a collection of products that compliments our lineup it perfectly. The MedLight Additionals range is constantly expanding.

ML.Index.SupportBanner.Description
LocaleResource.Value:
We’re here to help. MEDlight-certified repairs are performed by trusted experts who use genuine parts. Whichever option you choose, you’ll get your product back working exactly the way it should.
Service and support from the people who know your devices best. Because MEDlight makes the hardware, our experts understand how everything works and resolve issues as fast as possible.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Index.SupportBanner.Description1
LocaleResource.Value: We’re here to help. MEDlight-certified repairs are performed by trusted experts who use genuine parts. Whichever option you choose, you’ll get your product back working exactly the way it should.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Index.SupportBanner.Description2
LocaleResource.Value: Service and support from the people who know your devices best. Because MEDlight makes the hardware, our experts understand how everything works and resolve issues as fast as possible.

ML.N-LINET.Carousel.Image0
ML.N-LINET.Carousel.Image1
ML.N-LINET.Carousel.Image2
ML.N-LINET.Carousel.Item0
LocaleResource.Value: The device is designed according to ergonomic principles and puts patients in a back-friendly and comfortable sitting position during treatment.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINET.Carousel.Item1
LocaleResource.Value: Appropriate dose limits are preset to help prevent operational errors. The N-LINE T is equipped with an industrial-grade controller. You simply enter the dose and the system automatically calculates the treatment duration. The optional touchscreen intuitively guides the operator through the treatment setup.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINET.Carousel.Item2
LocaleResource.Value: The enclosure reduces UV light spill for increased patient and personnel safety. A physical key lock prevents unauthorized use. A clearly visible emergency stop button stops the treatment at any time.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINET.Description1
LocaleResource.Value: The N-LINE T MODULE targets moderate or even severe lesions with high doses of UV while reducing exposure to the unaffected skin. You can always place the device, depending on the application: On the floor or a table. The module uses real-time dosimetry to improve safety and accuracy. Its portability makes it easy to integrate into any clinical setting. It can also help patients self-treat at home. Self-treatment devices can provide an improved quality of life compared to outpatient phototherapy. They also free up a clinic‘s medical resources.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINET.Featurelist.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Discover what makes the N-LINE T the ideal device for the professional treatment of the extremeties.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINET.Featurelist.Feature1.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The system continuously monitors the UV output and turns off individual modules when the selected dose is achieved.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINET.Featurelist.Feature10.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Each of the four modules uses an active cooling system. The temperature management maximizes the lamps’ service life and performance.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINET.Featurelist.Feature11.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Every module is equipped with an electronic ballast. Users benefit from reduced energy consumption while increasing the service life of the lamps. Electronic ballasts can operate for over 50,000 hours (minimum expectancy) at the maximum rated case temperature and keep your maintenance costs low.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINET.Featurelist.Feature2.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Deliver effective phototherapy to the extremities and target each area with precision. Choose synchronized dosing or enter a separate dose for each module.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINET.Featurelist.Feature3.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The crystal-clear acrylic shielding protects the lamps from dirt and damage. UV light passes through the shield unhindered. Cleaning or surface disinfection is quick and easy.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINET.Featurelist.Feature4.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The compact design makes it an ideal fit for any clinic setting. The N-LINE T can be easily moved between treatment rooms thanks to the castors and safety brakes.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINET.Featurelist.Feature5.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The device is designed according to ergonomic principles and puts patients in a back-friendly and comfortable sitting position during treatment.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINET.Featurelist.Feature6.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Appropriate dose limits are preset to help prevent operational errors. The N-LINE T is equipped with an industrial-grade controller. You simply enter the dose and the system automatically calculates the treatment duration. The optional touchscreen intuitively guides the operator through the treatment setup.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINET.Featurelist.Feature7.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The high intensity of +19 mW/cm² (at 0 cm distance) is more cost-effective as fewer phototherapy units are needed to treat more patients. Shortening the duration can improve the patient’s experience, reduce waiting times, increase satisfaction with the doctor’s visit, and provide more access to care.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINET.Featurelist.Feature8.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The enclosure reduces UV light spill for increased patient and personnel safety. A physical key lock prevents unauthorized use. A clearly visible emergency stop button stops the treatment at any time.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINET.Featurelist.Feature9.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Water-resistant acrylic panels are designed with a drip edge to direct fluids away from the enclosure. This protects the device against sweat, water, and potentially topical medications.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINET.Features.Feature1.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Deliver effective phototherapy to the extremities and target each area with precision. Choose synchronized dosing or enter a separate dose for each module.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINET.Features.Feature2.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The crystal-clear acrylic shielding protects the lamps from dirt and damage. UV light passes through the shield unhindered. Cleaning or surface disinfection is quick and easy.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINET.Features.Feature3.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The system continuously monitors the UV output and turns off individual modules when the selected dose is achieved.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINET.Features.Feature4.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The compact design makes it an ideal fit for any clinic setting. The N-LINE T can be easily moved between treatment rooms thanks to the castors and safety brakes.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINET.Intro
LocaleResource.Value: This portable yet powerful module treats localized lesions in a clinical setting or as a home therapy device.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINET.Technologies.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Discover what makes the N-LINE T the perfect UV phototherapy device for the professional treatment of the extremities.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINETMODULE.Carousel.Image0
ML.N-LINETMODULE.Carousel.Image1
ML.N-LINETMODULE.Carousel.Image2
ML.N-LINETMODULE.Carousel.Item0
LocaleResource.Value: The design is perfect for home therapy because it is so easy to use. Patients simply adhere to their physicians treatment plan and enter the dose. The system will automatically calculate the treatment duration. You can give patients back their freedom by giving them the ability to perform treatments at home.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINETMODULE.Carousel.Item1
LocaleResource.Value: Quickly position the unit in an upright or flat orientation, on the floor or a table - depending on your needs. You can effectively treat hands, legs, feet, or any medium-sized areas of the body.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINETMODULE.Carousel.Item2
LocaleResource.Value: Weighing only 7.5 kg, the module is easy to move between treatment rooms. The compact design makes it easy to fit into any clinic or home environment.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINETMODULE.Config.Help.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Talk to our experts or explore the detailed differences in our technical specs.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINETMODULE.Config.Included3
LocaleResource.Value: Easy to use, portable and robust design

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINETMODULE.Config.Intro
LocaleResource.Value: The compact treatment device for targeted therapy, providing professional UV phototherapy for in-home therapy.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINETMODULE.Description1
LocaleResource.Value: The N-LINE T MODULE targets moderate or even severe lesions with high doses of UV while reducing exposure to the unaffected skin. You can always place the device, depending on the application: On the floor or a table. The module uses real-time dosimetry to improve safety and accuracy. Its portability makes it easy to integrate into any clinical setting. It can also help patients self-treat at home. Self-treatment devices can provide an improved quality of life compared to outpatient phototherapy. They also free up a clinic‘s medical resources.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINETMODULE.Featurelist.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Discover what makes the N-LINE T MODULE such a great device for the targeted treatment of upper body, hands, feet and legs.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINETMODULE.Featurelist.Feature1.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Real-time dosimetry guarantees reliable results by constantly monitoring the energy output and adjusting the treatment, ensuring that you deliver the intended dose, regardless of variables, such as lamp condition or voltage.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINETMODULE.Featurelist.Feature10.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The high intensity of +19 mW/cm² (at 0 cm distance) can be more cost-effective. Shortening the duration can improve the patient’s experience, reduce waiting times, increase satisfaction with the doctor’s visit, and provide more access to care.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINETMODULE.Featurelist.Feature2.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Quickly position the unit in an upright or flat orientation, on the floor or a table - depending on your needs. You can effectively treat hands, legs, feet, or any medium-sized areas of the body. Simply adjust the seating or placement to make the treatment more comfortable for your patients.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINETMODULE.Featurelist.Feature3.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Weighing only 7.5 kg, the module is easy to move between treatment rooms. The compact design makes it easy to fit into any clinic or home environment.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINETMODULE.Featurelist.Feature4.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The design is perfect for home therapy because it is so easy to use. Patients simply adhere to their physicians treatment plan and enter the dose. The system will automatically calculate the treatment duration. You can give patients back their freedom by giving them the ability to perform treatments at home.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINETMODULE.Featurelist.Feature5.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The N-LINE T MODULE is equipped with an straightforward industrial-grade controller. Appropriate dose limits are preset to help prevent operational errors.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINETMODULE.Featurelist.Feature6.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The crystal-clear acrylic shielding protects the lamps from dirt and damage. UV light passes through the shield unhindered. Cleaning or surface disinfection is quick and easy.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINETMODULE.Featurelist.Feature7.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Water-resistant acrylic panels are designed with a drip edge to direct fluids away from the enclosure. This protects the device against sweat, water, and topical medications.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINETMODULE.Featurelist.Feature8.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The module uses an active cooling system. The temperature management maximizes the lamps’ service life and performance.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINETMODULE.Featurelist.Feature9.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Electronic ballasts provide higher lamp efficacy, lower power consumption, and longer lamp life. An Electronic ballast will generally operate for over 50,000 hours (minimum expectancy), so they do not need to be replaced very often.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINETMODULE.Features.Feature1.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The design is perfect for home therapy because it is so easy to use. You can give patients back their freedom by giving them the ability to perform treatments at home.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINETMODULE.Features.Feature2.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The crystal-clear acrylic shielding protects the lamps from dirt and damage. This protects the device against sweat, water, and topical medications.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINETMODULE.Features.Feature3.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Quickly position the unit in an different positions - depending on your needs. You can effectively treat hands, legs, feet, or any medium-sized areas of the body.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINETMODULE.Features.Feature4.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Weighing only 7.5 kg, the module is easy to move between treatment rooms. The compact design makes it easy to fit into any clinic or home environment.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINETMODULE.Intro
LocaleResource.Value: This portable yet powerful module treats localized lesions in a clinical setting or as a home therapy device.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.N-LINETMODULE.Technologies.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Discover what makes the N-LINE T MODULE the perfect compact UV phototherapy device for home therapy.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Carousel.Image0
ML.NLINE.Carousel.Image1
ML.NLINE.Carousel.Image2
ML.NLINE.Carousel.Item0
LocaleResource.Value: The N-LINE pro features a modern touch screen that guides the operator through the treatment setup. Alternatively, you can create profiles to streamline the process. The intelligent interface assists you step by step and adds a layer of safety to prevent dosage errors.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Carousel.Item1
LocaleResource.Value: Cooling is important because it helps to maintain the optimal temperature for the lamp to operate efficiently and effectively. If the lamp is too hot, it can result in shortened lamp life and reduced UV output. The temperature management system maximizes service life and performance.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Carousel.Item2
LocaleResource.Value:
• A physical lock secures and shuts off the cabin.
  • Opening the door pauses treatment immediately.
  • An emergency handle detects when a patient is in distress, suspends treatment, and alerts the staff.
  • A clearly visible emergency stop button is located on the exterior.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Config.Model.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Each N-LINE System is designed to meet specific requirements. All models share a common foundation, boasting our unique core design along with all essential safety features.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Config.Model.Help.Sub
LocaleResource.Value: Talk to our experts or explore the detailed differences in our technical specs.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Config.Model.Intro
LocaleResource.Value: Which system is best for you?

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Config.Model.NLINE.Description
LocaleResource.Value: N-LINE28x UV lamps (3200VA)Industrial-Grade Control PanelNo Network Capabilities

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Config.Model.NLINEPRO.Description
LocaleResource.Value: N-LINE PRO40x UV lamps (4900VA)Touchscreen 6"PIN authorizationEmergency handleNetwork Capabilities

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Config.Model.NLINEPROMAX.Description
LocaleResource.Value: N-LINE PRO MAX All N-LINE PRO Features Extra Large Touchscreen 12" Patient Voice Guide Emergency handle Active Comfort Flow

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Ecoflex.Figure1.Sub
LocaleResource.Value: Save on initial and replacement cost while also reducing energy consumption.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Ecoflex.Sub
LocaleResource.Value: Use the full potential of standard-length lamps for patients up to 200cm. Sustainable technology that cares for patients and the planet.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Featurelist.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The N-LINE System is designed to meet your specific requirements. All models share a common foundation, boasting our unique core design along with all essential safety features.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Featurelist.Feature1.Description
LocaleResource.Value: All lamps are arranged on a curve to concentrate the light where it is needed. The ARC-Concept provides excellent exposure to the lower extremities while allowing the treatment of even taller patients (2 meters).

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Featurelist.Feature10.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The overhead air intake keeps dust and dirt particles out of the system to maintain the maximum performance of the UV lamps.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Featurelist.Feature11.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The open top prevents patients from feeling confined, while the UV reflectors (RSEP) act as mirrors inside the cabin. Patients enjoy the perception of a more spacious and well-ventilated environment.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Featurelist.Feature12.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Well-placed handle grips keep patients stable and in the optimal treatment position.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Featurelist.Feature2.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Intelligent placement allows 1.8m lamps to effectively perform as 2m lamps without wasting energy. This enables treatment for taller patients while embracing eco-friendliness and offering long-term cost savings with standard length lamps.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Featurelist.Feature3.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The N-LINE series is for professionals where reliability and durability matter. The galvanized steel body and door with powder coating are constructed for long-term use.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Featurelist.Feature4.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The bottom platform and lamp shielding are made of medical-grade materials that can be removed for easy cleaning and disinfection.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Featurelist.Feature5.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The crystal-clear acrylic shielding protects the lamps from dirt and damage. UV light passes through the shield unhindered. Cleaning or surface disinfection is quick and easy.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Featurelist.Feature6.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Reflective back panels direct the UV light at the user, maximizing lamp efficiency and allows for shorter treatments. Simultaneously, the panels visually increase the cabin space.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Featurelist.Feature7.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Despite its compact size, every lamp uses electronic starters. Users benefit from reduced energy consumption and increased service life of the lamps.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Featurelist.Feature8.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Smooth Air Technology (SAT) - Cooling is important because it helps to maintain the optimal temperature for the lamp to operate efficiently and effectively. If the lamp is too hot, it can result in shortened lamp life and reduced UV output. The temperature management system maximizes service life and performance.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Featurelist.Feature9.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Premium cooling fans with advanced fluid-dynamic bearings keep the cabin at an unobtrusive volume level and make communication easier.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Features.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Discover our state of the art technologies that make the N-LINE the best uv phototherapy cabin

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Features.Feature1.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Advanced sensors continuously monitor the UV output and provide real-time dosage calculations.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Features.Feature2.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The curved lamp arrangement is based on the human body and ensures a uniform distance to the skin.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Features.Feature3.Description
LocaleResource.Value: By channeling air through carefully engineered pathways, we reduce dust particles inside the equipment.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Features.Feature4.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The advanced polymer protects the lamps from dirt and damage while transmitting the UV light unhindered.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Features.Feature5.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The high-efficiency fan array maximizes the lamp's life and performance without interfering with your work.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Features.Feature6.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The advanced polymer protects the lamps from dirt and damage while transmitting the UV light unhindered.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Intro
LocaleResource.Value: Our most powerful and capable phototherapy system ever.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Intro.Description1
LocaleResource.Value: The N-LINE series is the ultimate solution for professional UV phototherapy. Featuring two exceptional models, each designed to meet your specific requirements. Both models share a common foundation, boasting our unique core design along with all essential safety features.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Skindex.Description
LocaleResource.Value: SKINdex is MEDlights propriety treatment management software. Combine data collection, therapy planning, and cabin operation into a single system.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Skindex.Remote.Sub
LocaleResource.Value: Control up to seperate systems remotely

LocaleResource.Name: ML.NLINE.Skindex.Required
LocaleResource.Value: (SKINdex requires a N-LINE PRO or N-LINE PRO MAX)

LocaleResource.Name: ML.OCTADERM.Carousel.Body1
LocaleResource.Value: The OCTADERM has been designed specifically with in-home users in mind.

LocaleResource.Value: The OCTADERM is equipped with a simple industrial-grade controller, physical soft-touch buttons, and a digital display. You enter the dosage and the device automatically calculates the treatment duration. Consecutive sequences can be preset for uninterrupted front and back treatments.

You enter the dosage and the device automatically calculates the treatment duration. Consecutive sequences can be preset for uninterrupted front and back treatments.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Octaderm.Config.Help.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Talk to our experts or explore the detailed differences in our technical specs.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Octaderm.Config.Intro
LocaleResource.Value: The mobile full body treatment device, providing professional UV phototherapy for in-home therapy.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.OCTADERM.Description1
LocaleResource.Value: The OCTADERM is a full body phototherapy device that plugs into standard power outlets. It offers convenience and therapeutic effectiveness of UV phototherapy in a slim design with a variety of lamp configurations. This product is aimed at professional users with limited space and in-home treatment for patients requiring full body therapy. Every OCTADERM uses real-time dosimetry to provide an accurate, reliable and safe treatment.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.OCTADERM.Featurelist.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The OCTADERM is designed to meet your specific requirements.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.OCTADERM.Featurelist.Feature1.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The OCTADERM is equipped with a simple industrial-grade controller, physical soft-touch buttons, and a digital display. You enter the dosage and the device automatically calculates the treatment duration. Consecutive sequences can be preset for uninterrupted front and back treatments.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.OCTADERM.Featurelist.Feature10.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Rubberized unit castors simplify handling and transport. After each treatment, it is easy to move the device to a convenient location for storage.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.OCTADERM.Featurelist.Feature11.Description
LocaleResource.Value: We’ve created a quick-connect system that makes assembling the OCTADERM a breeze - no tools required. It even connects to a standard power outlet.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.OCTADERM.Featurelist.Feature2.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Real-time dosimetry guarantees reliable results by constantly monitoring the energy output and adjusting the treatment, ensuring that you deliver the intended dose, regardless of variables, such as lamp condition or voltage.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.OCTADERM.Featurelist.Feature3.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Low lamp placement provides excellent UV exposure to the lower extremities. Knees, calves, and shins are common areas where psoriasis can occur.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.OCTADERM.Featurelist.Feature4.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Despite its compact size, every lamp uses electronic starters. Users benefit from reduced energy consumption and increased service life of the lamps.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.OCTADERM.Featurelist.Feature5.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The compact design makes it an ideal fit where space is limited (e.g. smaller practices or private homes). Castors with safety brakes make it easy to move the unit between rooms.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.OCTADERM.Featurelist.Feature6.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The lid of the unit has a convenient storage compartment for accessories.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.OCTADERM.Featurelist.Feature7.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Reflective panels direct the UV light at the user, maximizing lamp efficiency and decreasing the treatment duration.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.OCTADERM.Featurelist.Feature8.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The crystal-clear acrylic shielding protects the lamps from dirt and damage. UV light passes through the shielding unhindered. Cleaning or surface disinfection is quick and easy.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.OCTADERM.Featurelist.Feature9.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Operation is simple and safe while effectively treating the whole body. The physician can preset a dose limit to prevent incorrect handling by the patient.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.OCTADERM.Features.Feature1.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Advanced sensors continuously monitor the UV output and provide real-time dosage calculations.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.OCTADERM.Features.Feature2.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The advanced polymer protects the lamps from dirt and damage while transmitting the UV light unhindered.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.OCTADERM.Features.Feature3.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The advanced polymer protects the lamps from dirt and damage while transmitting the UV light unhindered.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.OCTADERM.Features.Feature4.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Ease of use and and a compact design redefine in-home therapy. With smooth rubberized castors, seamlessly transition between treatments and simply store the device away after each use.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.OCTADERM.Herfofeature.Figure1.Image
ML.OCTADERM.Herfofeature.Figure1.Sub
LocaleResource.Value: The OCTADERM is equipped with a simple industrial-grade controller, physical soft-touch buttons, and a digital display. You enter the dosage and the device automatically calculates the treatment duration. Consecutive sequences can be preset for uninterrupted front and back treatments.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.OCTADERM.Herfofeature.Figure2.Image
ML.OCTADERM.Herfofeature.Sub
LocaleResource.Value: The OCTADERM has been designed specifically with in-home users in mind.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.OCTADERM.Intro
LocaleResource.Value: A convenient and mobile full-body UV therapy device featuring real-time sensor-guided dosimetry.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.OCTADERM.Technologies.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Discover what makes the OCTADERME the perfect compact full body UV phototherapy device

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Skindex.Screen
ML.Treviolux.Carousel.Body1
LocaleResource.Value: The intuitive touchscreen assists in the treatment process. Use the standardized treatment presets or freely adjust the dose and light output. Save frequently used settings for quick access. Treatment records are saved and can be reviewed.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Carousel.Body2
LocaleResource.Value: The latest generation of high-performance LEDs reduce energy consumption while being safe and reliable. They are designed for over 65,000 hours of use. Special focus lenses ensure homogeneous an adjustable output of up to 90MW/CM2.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Carousel.Body3
LocaleResource.Value: Quickly set up the best treatment position using the flexible treatment arm. The trifold treatment segments can be angled and perfectly match the shape of the treatment area.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Carousel.Image0
ML.Treviolux.Carousel.Image1
ML.Treviolux.Carousel.Image2
ML.Treviolux.Carousel.Item0
LocaleResource.Value: Quickly set up the best treatment position using the flexible treatment arm. The trifold treatment segments can be angled and perfectly match the shape of the treatment area.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Carousel.Item1
LocaleResource.Value: The intuitive touchscreen assists in the treatment process. Use the standardized treatment presets or freely adjust the dose and light output. Save frequently used settings for quick access. Treatment records are saved and can be reviewed.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Carousel.Item2
LocaleResource.Value: The latest generation of high-performance LEDs reduce energy consumption while being safe and reliable. They are designed for over 65,000 hours of use. Special focus lenses ensure homogeneous an adjustable output of up to 90MW/CM2.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Config.Help.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Talk to our experts or explore the detailed differences in our technical specs.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Config.Included1
LocaleResource.Value: PDT device with touchscreen and 3 treatment modes

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Config.Included2
LocaleResource.Value: Device certificate, medical measurement protocol, technical safety protocol

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Config.Included3
LocaleResource.Value: PDT user safety glasses, PDT patient safety glasses

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Config.Intro
LocaleResource.Value: The PDT device that offers the best of three worlds in one sleek device, providing top-tier PDT treatment.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Config.ModelDescription
LocaleResource.Value: Please choose your desired options below to personalize your device. Afterwards, you can send your request and we will get into contact with you as soon as possible.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Config.RequestQuote
LocaleResource.Value: You can send us your configuration to get a free quote below.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Description1
LocaleResource.Value: With the certified PDT lamp TREVIOLUX you can choose between conventional photodynamic therapy, low-pain Compact Daylight PDT, or skin rejuvenation. Three treatment modes in a single compact device. Designing the right treatment is now faster and easier than ever.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Featurelist.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The TREVIOLUX is a versatile and innovative device designed to cater to a wide range of applications. With a unified core design a it delivers exceptional performance and reliability, making it a standout choice for PDT treatments.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Featurelist.Feature1.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The TREVIOLUX combines three applications in a single device. At a peak wavelength of 630 nm, the light penetrates deep and effectively into the tissue during irradiation.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Featurelist.Feature2.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The intuitive touchscreen assists in the treatment process. Use the standardized treatment presets or freely adjust the dose and light output. Save frequently used settings for quick access. Treatment records are saved and can be reviewed.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Featurelist.Feature3.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Quickly set up the best treatment position using the flexible treatment arm. The trifold treatment segments can be angled and perfectly match the shape of the treatment area.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Featurelist.Feature4.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Integrated wheels and its compact footprint make the device mobile. You can easily store or move the device between sessions. The mobile and compact design offers several advantages for all types of healthcare facilities, such as improved access for patients with disabilities and simple integration into existing environments.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Featurelist.Feature5.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The latest generation of high-performance LEDs reduce energy consumption while being safe and reliable. They are designed for over 65,000 hours of use. Special focus lenses ensure homogeneous an adjustable output of up to 90MW/CM2.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Featurelist.Feature6.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The large and homogeneous illumination area of 300CM2 allows the exposure of large lesions in a single session.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Featurelist.Feature7.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The housing is made from high-grade aluminum, durable, and easy to clean. Very little maintenance is needed to keep the hardware in excellent condition.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Featurelist.Feature8.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The Soft-Start function will gently increase the light output while maintaining the correct dosage. The patient has time to adjust, which makes the experience much more tolerable.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Featurelist.Feature9.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The optional Pulse-Mode can reduce discomfort for some patients by alternating the light intensity in an optimized pattern.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Features.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Discover our state of the art technologies that make the N-LINE the best uv phototherapy cabin

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Features.Feature1.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The TREVIOLUX combines three applications in a single device. Classic PDT, Compact-Daylight-PDT and Rejuvenation.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Features.Feature2.Description
LocaleResource.Value: The mobile and compact design offers several advantages for all types of healthcare facilities, such as improved access for patients with disabilities and simple integration into existing environments.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Features.Feature3.Description
LocaleResource.Value: We use the latest generation of high-performance LEDs to reduce energy consumption while being safe and reliable.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Features.Feature4.Description
LocaleResource.Value: From our virtually pain-free Compact-Daylight-PDT and Soft-Start feature to the Pulse-Mode, we are committed to enhancing the patient experience.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Herfofeature.Figure1.Sub
LocaleResource.Value: Conventional PDT (optional Soft-Start/Pulse-Mode) to treat actinic keratoses and basal cell carcinoma.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Herfofeature.Figure2.Sub
LocaleResource.Value: The Compact Daylight PDT is a unique, effective, and extremely beneficial approach to treatment. Inspired by the principles of the Daylight PDT. A controlled and virtually pain-free treatment - best suited for superficial actinic keratoses.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Herfofeature.Figure4.Sub
LocaleResource.Value: Skin rejuvenating effects of PDT for photoaged skin have been well-documented in several clinical trials. The rejuvenation mode simplifies the use of PDT for aesthetic applications.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Herfofeature.Sub
LocaleResource.Value: The TREVIOLUX combines three applications in a single device. At a peak wavelength of 630 nm, the light penetrates deep and effectively into the tissue during irradiation.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Intro
LocaleResource.Value: The effective 3-in-1 solution for modern photodynamic therapy.

LocaleResource.Name: ML.Treviolux.Technologies.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Our devices integrate cutting-edge technologies to deliver exceptional care, precise treatments, and a superior patient experience. These technologies exemplify our commitment to innovation and excellence.
